readable.title: 2312731013_1a3a8e25c6
readable.content: A man and a dog are sitting on the pavement are sitting by a wall . A man and his husky sitting in the snow at the corner of a building . A man is sitting in the snow with his dog asking for spare change . A man sits outside in the snow with his dog and blue blanket . Person sitting in snow on a sidewalk holding small black dog and a husky laying beside him .
